member.name: T:Serilog.LoggerConfigurationElasticsearchExtensions
member.summary: Adds the WriteTo.Elasticsearch() extension method to .

member.name: M:Serilog.LoggerConfigurationElasticsearchExtensions.Elasticsearch(Serilog.Configuration.LoggerSinkConfiguration,Serilog.Sinks.Elasticsearch.ElasticsearchSinkOptions)
member.summary:
Adds a sink that writes log events as documents to an Elasticsearch index. This works great with the Kibana web interface when using the default settings.
By passing in the BufferBaseFilename, you make this into a durable sink. Meaning it will log to disk first and tries to deliver to the Elasticsearch server in the background.
member.remarks: Make sure to have a sensible mapping in your Elasticsearch indexes. You can automatically create one by specifying this in the options.
member.param: Provides options specific to the Elasticsearch sink

member.name: M:Serilog.LoggerConfigurationElasticsearchExtensions.Elasticsearch(Serilog.Configuration.LoggerSinkConfiguration,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Overload to allow basic configuration through AppSettings.
member.param: A comma or semi column separated list of URIs for Elasticsearch nodes.

member.name: T:Serilog.Sinks.Elasticsearch.ElasticsearchJsonFormatter
member.summary: Custom Json formatter that respects the configured property name handling and forces 'Timestamp' to @timestamp

member.name: M:Serilog.Sinks.Elasticsearch.ElasticsearchJsonFormatter.#ctor(System.Boolean,System.String,System.Boolean,System.IFormatProvider,Elasticsearch.Net.Serialization.IElasticsearchSerializer,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Construct a .
member.param: If true, the properties of the event will be written to the output without enclosing braces. Otherwise, if false, each event will be written as a well-formed JSON object.
A string that will be written after each log event is formatted. If null, will be used. Ignored if is true.
If true, the message will be rendered and written to the output as a property named RenderedMessage.
Supplies culture-specific formatting information, or null.
Inject a serializer to force objects to be serialized over being ToString()
When set to true values will be written at the root of the json document

member.summary: Writes out individual renderings of attached properties

member.summary: Free resources held by the sink.

member.name: T:Serilog.Sinks.Elasticsearch.ElasticsearchSink
member.summary: Writes log events as documents to ElasticSearch.

member.name: M:Serilog.Sinks.Elasticsearch.ElasticsearchSink.#ctor(Serilog.Sinks.Elasticsearch.ElasticsearchSinkOptions)
member.summary: Creates a new ElasticsearchSink instance with the provided options
member.param: Options configuring how the sink behaves, may NOT be null

member.name: M:Serilog.Sinks.Elasticsearch.ElasticsearchSink.EmitBatch(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Serilog.Events.LogEvent})
member.summary: Emit a batch of log events, running to completion synchronously.

member.name: T:Serilog.Sinks.Elasticsearch.ElasticsearchSinkOptions
member.summary: Provides ElasticsearchSink with configurable options

member.name: P:Serilog.Sinks.Elasticsearch.ElasticsearchSinkOptions.AutoRegisterTemplate
member.summary: When set to true the sink will register an index template for the logs in elasticsearch. This template is optimized to deal with serilog events

member.name: P:Serilog.Sinks.Elasticsearch.ElasticsearchSinkOptions.TemplateName
member.summary: When using the feature this allows you to override the default template name. Defaults to: serilog-events-template

member.name: P:Serilog.Sinks.Elasticsearch.ElasticsearchSinkOptions.ModifyConnectionSettings
member.summary: Connection configuration to use for connecting to the cluster.

member.name: P:Serilog.Sinks.Elasticsearch.ElasticsearchSinkOptions.IndexFormat
member.summary: The index name formatter. A string.Format using the DateTimeOffset of the event is run over this string. defaults to "logstash-{0:yyyy.MM.dd}"

member.name: P:Serilog.Sinks.Elasticsearch.ElasticsearchSinkOptions.TypeName
member.summary: The default elasticsearch type name to use for the log events defaults to: logevent

member.name: P:Serilog.Sinks.Elasticsearch.ElasticsearchSinkOptions.BatchPostingLimit
member.summary: The maximum number of events to post in a single batch.

member.name: P:Serilog.Sinks.Elasticsearch.ElasticsearchSinkOptions.Period
member.summary: The time to wait between checking for event batches. Defaults to 2 seconds.

member.name: P:Serilog.Sinks.Elasticsearch.ElasticsearchSinkOptions.FormatProvider
member.summary: Supplies culture-specific formatting information, or null.

member.name: P:Serilog.Sinks.Elasticsearch.ElasticsearchSinkOptions.Connection
member.summary: Allows you to override the connection used to communicate with elasticsearch

member.name: P:Serilog.Sinks.Elasticsearch.ElasticsearchSinkOptions.ConnectionTimeout
member.summary: The connection timeout (in milliseconds) when sending bulk operations to elasticsearch (defaults to 5000)

member.name: P:Serilog.Sinks.Elasticsearch.ElasticsearchSinkOptions.InlineFields
member.summary: When true fields will be written at the root of the json document

member.name: P:Serilog.Sinks.Elasticsearch.ElasticsearchSinkOptions.MinimumLogEventLevel
member.summary: The minimum log event level required in order to write an event to the sink.

member.name: P:Serilog.Sinks.Elasticsearch.ElasticsearchSinkOptions.Serializer
member.summary: When passing a serializer unknown object will be serialized to object instead of relying on their ToString representation

member.name: P:Serilog.Sinks.Elasticsearch.ElasticsearchSinkOptions.ConnectionPool
member.summary: The connectionpool describing the cluster to write event to

member.name: P:Serilog.Sinks.Elasticsearch.ElasticsearchSinkOptions.IndexDecider
member.summary: Function to decide which index to write the LogEvent to

member.name: P:Serilog.Sinks.Elasticsearch.ElasticsearchSinkOptions.BufferBaseFilename
member.summary: Optional path to directory that can be used as a log shipping buffer for increasing the reliability of the log forwarding.

member.name: P:Serilog.Sinks.Elasticsearch.ElasticsearchSinkOptions.BufferFileSizeLimitBytes
member.summary: The maximum size, in bytes, to which the buffer log file for a specific date will be allowed to grow. By default no limit will be applied.

member.name: P:Serilog.Sinks.Elasticsearch.ElasticsearchSinkOptions.BufferLogShippingInterval
member.summary: The interval between checking the buffer files

member.name: P:Serilog.Sinks.Elasticsearch.ElasticsearchSinkOptions.CustomFormatter
member.summary: Customizes the formatter used when converting log events into ElasticSearch documents. Please note that the formatter output must be valid JSON :)

member.name: P:Serilog.Sinks.Elasticsearch.ElasticsearchSinkOptions.CustomDurableFormatter
member.summary: Customizes the formatter used when converting log events into the durable sink. Please note that the formatter output must be valid JSON :)
